Package game

Class saveGame

java.lang.Object
game.saveGame
public class saveGame
extends java.lang.Object
Since:
1.12 This class is saveGame. This class has all the variables and methods needed to save the players progress and write it to a .txt file This class checks whether there's already a text file to write to and if there is it wont create a new one. It then writes the players Username, Level, Score, Time, Health and X and Y positions. It then allows a method to be called to read this information back from the .txt file to setup the game. It also has a method to see if the user has an entry in the text file or not, if not the player continues the game as normal. When called, the game only allows the player to save their progress once to add more difficulty to the game.
Version:
1.13.2
Author:
Will Dibble wodibble@gmail.com

      name - Username of Player.
      level - Level player is currently on.
      score - Players current score.
      time - Players current time.
      health - Players current health.
      posX - Players X Position.
      posY - Players Y Position.
